entries.waypoint_description_1: Valarian's thugs kidnapped Palu's little sister on her way back from the palace. Rescue her and return her to Palu's shop.
entries.return_waypoint_description_1: Bring Feinu back to her big sister in town to collect your reward.
entries.player_sorry: I am still looking for her.
entries.player_more_1_1: How did they get a hold of you?
entries.player_2_1: No, I have no time to help you now.
entries.player_1_1: Yes. I will find her and bring her back here unharmed.
entries.otherescort_1: Save yourself! Valarian's enforcers are trying to kill me!
entries.npc_takeme_1: Take me to my sister, please! We'll get revenge on these Valarian swoopers some day!
entries.npc_reward_1: Thank you so much! Here - please take this special suit.  It is resistant to disease. Jabba's scouts use this type of equipment whenever they're around the Sarlacc. It keeps them alive.
entries.npc_reset: Then I hope, for your sake ... she's not hurt. Jabba helps me when I need him. I may need him to teach you a lesson. Do you understand?
entries.npc_noloc_1: Wait a minute. Now that I think about it... maybe we should wait. Feinu has a new friend outside of town. Maybe she's stopped off for a visit?
entries.npc_more_1_1: They caught me on the way back from the palace. My sister says I shouldn't walk the road to Wayfar by myself. Valarian's thugs jumped me and told me they were going to hold me for ransom.
entries.npc_failure_1: How could you have let this happen?! Oh, no... no... no... What am I going to do, now?
entries.npc_dropoff_1: Ahh... thank you so much for helping me! Those thugs would have disintegrated me for sure!
entries.npc_backtowork_1: She was supposed to be following the road to the palace... so she could be just outside of town. Please hurry!
entries.npc_4_1: Feinu. She runs errands for me. Mostly she delivers new equipment to Jabba's elite guard. Jabba and I have an agreement of sorts. The road from here to there is pretty dangerous. Valarian is always trying to mess things up. I worry that they have done something bad to Feinu. Will you go find her for me?
entries.npc_3_1: Are you kidding me? You don't have TIME to help? You better change your mind!
entries.npc_2_1: Thanks. When you return I will reward you with special disease-resistant equipment... none better in the galaxy. Now, please hurry!
entries.npc_1_1: You want my help? Then you help me, first. The palace scouts say that my sister left to come back here several hours ago... but she hasn't shown up. I fear the worst. Can you run to the edge of town and see if you can find my sister? Bring her back here to me?
entries.notyet: Hello. I don't know you. Why don't you go to the other side of town and see Jowir Ar'Lensa. He loves meeting new people. Thanks.
entries.next: I can't give you anything else. If Jabba finds out that I gave you special disease-resistant equipment... which is made EXCLUSIVELY for his elite guard... he'll have us both killed. Now, go on. Goodbye!
entries.dontknowyou_1: Valarian's thugs told me that if I moved... they would disintegrate me on the spot! Please go! I don't want them to kill you, too.
entries.cant_work: I'm a little busy at the moment... making disease-resistant clothing and other high-quality garb for Jabba's elite forces. Check back with me later.
